name: 8 Card Gamepack for Raspberry Pi
description:
8 Classic Card Games in One! This game features smart computer AI players to keep you challenged for hours. Use the online instructions to learn the rules. Game play is quick as cards fly across the screen. Listen to pleasant background music and enjoy the games.

Games Included:

  • Canasta
  • Euchre
  • Gin Rummy
  • Go Fish
  • Hearts
  • Spades
  • Old Maid
  • Pinochle

Features:

  • 8 card games
  • Computer players
  • In-game instructions
  • Quick play
  • Soothing soundtrack
